name: Teamwork makes the dream work
description:
This is my first game jam i have been in so if any of the builds are wonky then just use the html version. With that out of the way, this game is about two creatures who have gotten themselves stuck on a plank and they have to get to the end of this "naturally" generated obstacle course.

Controls:
P1 = WASD
P2 = Arrow keys or gamepad
